error.message: Parameter $query of method Drupal\prevnext\PrevnextService::__construct() has typehint with deprecated class Drupal\Core\Entity\Query\QueryFactory. Deprecated in drupal:8.3.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityStorageInterface::getQuery() or \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityStorageInterface::getAggregateQuery() instead.
Call to deprecated constant NODE_PUBLISHED: Deprecated in drupal:8.?.? and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\node\NodeInterface::PUBLISHED instead.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to prevnext.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
A drupal/core requirement is not present in composer.json. Having a composer.json is not a requirement for Drupal 9 compatibility but if there is one, it should include a drupal/core requirement.
